title: Too Weird for Pity

panel_structure.description: Wide shot of the Architect floating in space, body deformed into angular geometric shapes, embracing its own strangeness
Close-up on the angular deformations—not flaws but unique features of consciousness manifesting in space
Pull back to show both forms of consciousness as equally strange constructions in the cosmic void

transformation_notes: The angular deformations in space represent how both consciousness forms are too uniquely constructed for simple emotions like pity—they deserve awe instead.
